sdf:title: OMA LwM2M Up/Down Control (Object ID 3344)
title: Up/Down Control
description: This IPSO object is used to report the state of an up/down control element like a pair of push buttons or a rotary encoder. Counters for increase and decrease operations are provided for counting pulses from a quadrature encoder.

Up_Counter.title: Up Counter
Up_Counter.description: Counts the number of times the increase control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

Down_Counter.title: Down Counter
Down_Counter.description: Counts the times the decrease control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

Application_Type.title: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
